description:
Can't submit single row data table unless a column name is put in for second column.


Create a new data table and name the data table
Leave multi-row unchecked.
Add a row to the data table by filling in the fields and clicking the plus sign.
Expected Behaviour
Should be able to successfully submit data table.
Actual Behaviour
Can't submit data table because the field for Column Name in the Add Columns row is highlighted red, saying it's required.

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Can't Submit Single Row Data Table without Putting in Name for Second Column
